mapper.select: SELECT a.id, num, sku_properties_name AS "skuPropertiesName", item_id AS "item.id", order_id AS "order.id", b.code AS "item.code" , b.title AS "item.title", b.sku AS "item.sku", b.weight AS "item.weight" FROM sc_ship_order_detail a LEFT JOIN sc_item b ON a.item_id = b.id WHERE order_id = #{id}

SELECT b.id as "userId", b.shop_name as "shopName", b.id, count(0) as "num", sum(c.num) as "items" FROM sc_ship_order a LEFT JOIN sc_user b ON a.create_userid = b.id left join sc_ship_order_detail c on c.order_id = a.id WHERE a.type='send' and (a.status='SEND_FINISH' or a.status='WAIT_BUYER_RECEIVED')
and a.`create_userid`= #{userId}
and a.`create_date` > date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and a.`create_date` <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by a.`create_userid`
